titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives commemorating the Republic of India's Independence Day and recognizing United States-India relations on India's National Day.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives commemorating the Republic of India's Independence Day and recognizing United States-India relations on India's National Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Asia and the Pacific.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
Recognizes the 68th anniversary of India's independence.
Celebrates the contributions of Americans of Indian descent to U.S. society.
Calls for the continued strengthening of U.S.-India relations and remains committed to fostering the U.S.-India strategic partnership.
